metadata.name: Grove — Chain Configuration
metadata.description: Grove chain configuration: active chains, ALM proxy addresses, vault proxy, and debt source. PSM3 uses shared infrastructure — no Grove-specific PSM3 contracts.

chains.name: Ethereum
chains.notes: Primary chain. Debt sourced from Vat. Holds RWA, Aave, Ripple, Securitize, Agora, Curve, Uniswap, Steakhouse positions.

chains.name: Base
chains.notes: PSM3 used for debt PnL on L2. Not in STAR_CHAINS for debt PnL — PSM3 processing added separately by debt-pnl.service.ts:118.

chains.name: Avalanche
chains.notes: Centrifuge, Arch (Galaxy CLO) positions. Not in STAR_CHAINS for debt PnL.

chains.name: Plume
chains.notes: Centrifuge positions. Not in STAR_CHAINS for debt PnL.

chains.name: Monad
chains.notes: Agora, Morpho, Uniswap positions. Not in STAR_CHAINS for debt PnL.

debtSource.notes: Same Vat contract as Spark and Obex. PSM3 processing on L2 chains added by debt-pnl.service.ts for ['base','arbitrum','optimism','unichain'].
